content.title: Intro
content.content:
1976 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar

Publication Information

Illustrator	The Brothers Hildebrandt
Publisher	Ballantine Books (US)
Released	1975
Format	Stapled calendar with mailer (13 x 121⁄4 inches)
ISBN	345-24725-6-495
Preceded by	The J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1975
Followed by	1977 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar

The 1976 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar was the official Tolkien calendar published by Ballantine Books in 1975. It features art by The Brothers Hildebrandt based on The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings.

content.title: Illustrations
content.content:
January - "Gandalf Visits Bilbo"
February - "Tom Bombadil"
March - "At the Prancing Pony"
April - "Bilbo at Rivendell"
May - "The Ring of Galadriel"
June - "Captured by the Orcs"
Centrefold - "The Fellowship of the Ring"
July - "The Road to Minas Tirith"
August - "Treebeard"
September - "Saruman at Orthanc"
October - "City of the Ringwraiths"
November - "Éowyn and the Nazgûl"
December - "The Return of the King"

content.content: The Hobbit Calendar 1976, published in the UK
